MicroJPEGPICTURE PERFECT
    MicroJPEGPICTURE PERFECT
    WebAPIPlugin

    Complete API Documentation

    Comprehensive guide to integrate image compression and conversion into your applications. Support for all major formats with tier-based access control.

    Quick Start

    curl -X POST \
  https://api.microjpeg.com/v1/compress \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_test_1234567890abcdef" \
  -F "image=@your-image.jpg" \
  -F "settings={\"quality\": 85, \"outputFormat\": \"webp\"}"

    • ‚Ä¢ Python requests

    Base URL

    https://api.microjpeg.com/v1

    Authentication

    Authorization: Bearer sk_test_...

    API Endpoints

    POST
    /compress

    Compress or convert a single image file

    Parameters

    imageFile (required) - The image file to process
    settingsJSON (optional) - Compression settings object

    Settings Object

    {
  "quality": 85,              // 1-100 (default: 75)
  "outputFormat": "webp",     // jpeg, png, webp, avif, tiff
  "compressionAlgorithm": "standard", // standard, aggressive, lossless
  "progressive": false,       // Progressive JPEG
  "resize": {
    "width": 1920,           // Optional resize
    "height": 1080,
    "maintainAspect": true
  }
}

    Example Request

    curl -X POST \
  https://api.microjpeg.com/v1/compress \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_test_1234567890abcdef" \
  -F "image=@your-image.jpg" \
  -F "settings={\"quality\": 85, \"outputFormat\": \"webp\"}"

    JavaScript Example

    const formData = new FormData();
formData.append('image', file);
formData.append('settings', JSON.stringify({
  quality: 85,
  outputFormat: 'webp'
}));

const response = await fetch('https://api.microjpeg.com/v1/compress', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer sk_test_1234567890abcdef'
  },
  body: formData
});

const result = await response.json();

    POST
    /batch

    Process multiple images in a single request

    Parameters

    imagesFiles (required) - Array of image files (max 10)
    settingsJSON (optional) - Same settings as single compress

    Example Request

    curl -X POST \
  https://api.microjpeg.com/v1/batch \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_test_1234567890abcdef" \
  -F "images=@image1.jpg" \
  -F "images=@image2.png" \
  -F "settings={\"quality\": 85, \"outputFormat\": \"jpeg\"}"

    POST
    /special/convert

    Convert RAW, SVG, or TIFF files to standard formats

    Premium/Enterprise Only: RAW format conversion requires Premium or Enterprise tier

    Supported RAW Formats

    .CR2 (Canon)
    .ARW (Sony)
    .DNG (Adobe)
    .NEF (Nikon)
    .ORF (Olympus)
    .RAF (Fuji)

    Example Request

    curl -X POST \
  https://api.microjpeg.com/v1/special/convert \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_test_1234567890abcdef" \
  -F "file=@IMG_0001.CR2" \
  -F "settings={\"outputFormat\": \"jpeg\", \"quality\": 90}"

    GET
    /usage

    Get usage statistics for your API key

    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_test_1234567890abcdef" \
  https://api.microjpeg.com/v1/usage

    Response

    {
  "usage": {
    "current_period": {
      "operations": 245,
      "limit": 10000,
      "remaining": 9755
    },
    "rate_limit": {
      "requests_per_hour": 1000,
      "current_hour_usage": 23
    }
  },
  "tier": "premium"
}

    Error Responses

    400Bad Request - Invalid parameters or file format
    401Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
    413File Too Large - Exceeds tier file size limit
    429Rate Limited - Too many requests
    500Server Error - Processing failed

    Compression Settings Reference

    Basic Settings

    quality10-100 (default: 75) - Compression quality level
    outputFormat"jpeg", "png", "webp", "avif", "tiff"
    progressivetrue/false - Progressive JPEG encoding
    webOptimizationtrue/false - Web-specific optimizations

    Advanced Settings

    compressionAlgorithm"standard", "aggressive", "mozjpeg"
    resizeQuality"lanczos", "bicubic", "bilinear"
    resizeObject with width, height, maintainAspect
    Example Settings Object:
    {
  "quality": 85,
  "outputFormat": "webp",
  "progressive": true,
  "compressionAlgorithm": "standard",
  "resize": {
    "width": 1920,
    "height": 1080,
    "maintainAspect": true
  }
}

    Rate Limits & Tier Comparison

    Free

    5 req/hour

    500 operations/month

    10MB file limit

    Pro

    100 req/hour

    10K operations/month

    75MB file limit

    Enterprise

    10000 req/hour

    50K operations/month

    200MB file limit

    Tier-Based Features:
    Free Tier
    • ‚Ä¢ Basic compression
    • ‚Ä¢ Format conversion
    • ‚Ä¢ Standard algorithms
    Pro Tier
    • ‚Ä¢ Batch processing
    • ‚Ä¢ Advanced algorithms
    • ‚Ä¢ RAW format support
    Enterprise Tier
    • ‚Ä¢ Webhook support
    • ‚Ä¢ Priority processing
    • ‚Ä¢ Custom integrations
